author: Lon.TV
description:
Buy one on Amazon: https://lon.tv/z0sl5 (compensated affiliate link) - Beelink's ME Mini PC is a compact server powered by an Intel N150 processor. It works as a PC but is better suited as a NAS server. In this video we'll see how it works with Unraid. See more self hosting:  https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZHp4d1HnIuPyazY7o7IPC09cxVBWc6C and subscribe ! http://lon.tv/s

title: Beelink ME Mini NAS / Server Review - Six NVME Slots for Compact Storage
